item.description:
This event is being hosted by Ben S.

Join us for Sunday brunch at The Cottage in Chestnut Hill!

The Cottage Chestnut Hill has it’s origin in two different lifestyles. The owners, John & Laura, are from different coasts. John grew up surfing the beaches of Southern California. Laura grew up in Wellesley and is the third generation in her family to have a business in town. Hence the decor, service and food reflect the casualness and familiarity of Southern California and the sophistication and warmth of New England.

A bright, sunny space with a fireplace, great food, terrific service and good prices - come join us for brunch!

Date: Sunday, July 22nd

Time: Brunch starts at 10am!

Place: The Cottage Restaurant

47 Boylston Street (Route 9)
Chestnut Hill, MA 02467
Tel 617.916.5413

Cost: The Cottage has loads of yummy brunch entrees to choose from. You will pay your server directly. Paypal is NOT available for this event.

Check out the brunch menu here: http://www.cottagechestnuthill.com/brunch.html

The Cottage is located in the old (original) Chestnut Hill Mall that borders Route 9. Legal Seafood is right next door, as is The Container Store! There is loads of free parking in the back.


Contact Information:

Ben S.

Email: ben01760@comcast.net

Please RSVP by Wednesday, July 18th!
item.how_to_find_us: You won't be able to miss us!
item.name: Sunday Brunch at the Cottage in Chestnut Hill
